channel.title: 2017 on East Back Corporation
channel.description: Recent content in 2017 on East Back Corporation

item.title: Sponsored as a sponsor of RubyWorld Conference 2017
item.description: As a silver sponsor, “RubyWorld Conference 2017” will be held at Kunibiki Messe, Shimane Industrial Exchange Center on Wednesday, November 1 and Thursday, November 2.

item.title: Open source software free demo experience site 'OSS PLAYGROUND' released
item.description: Open source software free demo experience site “OSS PLAYGROUND” has been released. “OSS PLAYGROUND” provides free information and demo environment

item.title: Contracted operation of Ruby Camp 2017 Summer and Spring 2018 from Shimane Prefecture
item.description: On May 29, 2017, we commissioned Shimane Prefecture for summer 2017 and 2018 spring operation. We have been commissioned to operate Ruby training camp since 2011, and this is our seventh year.
